markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Tiger Menuki](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2995)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=709" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 267 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 30 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to a weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32))</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You Strike with the affixed weapon

 
</row>

</column>

---

This tiger formed of pewter snarls viciously from your weapon's grip. When you activate the tiger, the weapon gains the [forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=180) and [sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194) traits on the triggering Strike and all other Strikes for 1 minute.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Tiger Menuki
